headline: A Look At Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Valuation After New Buyback Dividend And Earnings Momentum
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) is back in focus after announcing a new US$2b share buyback, a US$1.00 quarterly dividend, and setting expectations ahead of its upcoming fourth quarter earnings release. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. The announcement has landed after a strong run in the share price, with a 1 day share price return of 6.28% and a 30 day share price return of 15.56% lifting Royal Caribbean Cruises to US$297.75. Against that backdrop, the 1 year total...
